sentences.sContent: Your bedclothes are all tangled up.
He had hair like tangled string.
sentences.sCn: 他的头发就像一团乱麻。

sentences.sContent: the tangled web of local politics
sentences.sCn: 地方政坛错综复杂的关系网

synos.tran: 紊乱的；纠缠的；缠结的；复杂的

phrases.pCn: 与…吵架，争吵；与…争论；与…有纠葛

remMethod.val: 俩人纠缠(tangle)在一起跳探戈(tango)

trans.tranOther: twisted together in an untidy mass
